mapper.select: select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, m.* FROM member m, (select @rownum:=0) TPM order by mno desc) emp where emp.rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{maxLine}) and emp.rownum > (#{pageNum} *#{maxLine} - #{maxLine})

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, b.* FROM board b, (select @rownum:=0) TPM where b.category = #{category} order by b.bno desc ) emp where emp.rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{maxLine}) and emp.rownum > (#{pageNum} *#{maxLine} - #{maxLine})
